rules_text: For each player, destroy three target noncreature permanents they control. Each player searches their library for three basic land cards, puts them onto the battlefield, then shuffles.

Alt:For each player, choose three noncreature permanents they control. Each player sacrifices the chosen permanents, searches their libraries for three basic land cards and puts them onto the battlefield, then shuffles.

OG_1:
For each player, destroy three target noncreature permanents they control. Each player searches their library for three basic land cards, puts them onto the battlefield, then shuffles.
